subject: Little League
Baseball
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: For 19-year-old Alibay Barkley, there are a lot of uncertainties in life — his family situation, a possible baseball career. But one thing is certain: He can hit.
snippet: For 19-year-old Alibay Barkley, there are a lot of uncertainties in life — his family situation, a possible baseball career. But one thing is certain: He can hit.
